## About Me

I am a senior [Posse Scholar](https://www.possefoundation.org/about-posse) from Brooklyn, NY. I currently attend [Smith College](https://www.smith.edu/) as a full time student. I am a double major in Government and Statistical and Data Sciences

I graduated high school in 2019 with honors from Midwood High School in Brooklyn, NY with a GPA of 97.17.
